original_text: And your contribution shall be counted to you as though it were the grain of the threshing floor, and as the fullness of the winepress.
korean_text: 내가 너희의 거제물을 타작 마당에서 드리는 곡물과 포도즙 틀에서 드리는 즙 같이 여기리니

sentences.original_text: And your contribution shall be counted to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너의 헌물은 너에게 헤아려질 것이니

sentences.original_text: as though it were the grain of the threshing floor
and as the fullness of the winepress.
